PrecisApproval for the making by the Copyright Board of the EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM, WORK AND OTHER SUBJECT-MATTER RECORD-KEEPING REGULATIONS which specify the information that must be kept by an educational institutions in relation to the making, destruction, performance and marking of news programs and other programming that are subject to copyright.
